_meta.art_style: 2D cartoon, flat illustration, bold outlines, vibrant colors, office/tech theme, clean and friendly look inspired by Monkey GO Happy
_meta.base_style_suffix: 2D cartoon game art, flat style, bold dark outline, vibrant saturated colors, white or transparent background, no shading gradients, clean vector-like illustration, suitable for point-and-click puzzle game.
_meta.format_note: All items/characters/objects: PNG with transparent background. Backgrounds: JPG or PNG, 1920x1080. Items: 256x256. Characters: 512x512. MiniBugs: 128x128. UI: as noted.
_meta.usage: Feed each 'prompt' field directly to Gemini. Save output with the 'filename' as reference.
